mapper.insert: insert into SYSTEM_MACHINE (ID, MNO, STCD, MNAME, MTYPE, IP, PORT, STATUS, DESCRIPTION, SETTINGTYPE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, LASTLINKEDTIME, LASTDISTIME, GETDATATIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settingtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastlinkedtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastdistime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getdatatime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update SYSTEM_MACHINE set MNO = #{mno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STCD = #{stcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MNAME = #{mname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MTYPE = #{mtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PORT = #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SETTINGTYPE = #{settingtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTLINKEDTIME = #{lastlinkedtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTDISTIME = #{lastdistime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GETDATATIME = #{getdatatime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, MNO, STCD, MNAME, MTYPE, IP, PORT, STATUS, DESCRIPTION, SETTINGTYPE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, LASTLINKEDTIME, LASTDISTIME, GETDATATIME from SYSTEM_MACHINE where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, MNO, STCD, MNAME, MTYPE, IP, PORT, STATUS, DESCRIPTION, SETTINGTYPE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, LASTLINKEDTIME, LASTDISTIME, GETDATATIME from SYSTEM_MACHINE where 1=1 ${_parameter}

select ID, MNO, STCD, MNAME, MTYPE, IP, PORT, STATUS, DESCRIPTION, SETTINGTYPE, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, LASTLINKEDTIME, LASTDISTIME, GETDATATIME from SYSTEM_MACHINE where MNO = #{mno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
